languages.text: "Когда мы были на Тассере, мне не стоило быть таким истуканом, и пригласить тебя на танец. Я исправляюсь".
"When we were on Thassera, I shouldn't have been so standoffish. I should have asked you to dance. I am trying to make up for it now."
languages.original_text: "Когда мы были на Тассере, мне не стоило быть таким истуканом, и пригласить тебя на танец. Я исправляюсь".

traits.locale_text: "When we were on Thassera, I shouldn't have been so standoffish. I should have asked you to dance. I am trying to make up for it now."
"When we were on Thassera, I shouldn't have been so standoffish. I should have asked you to dance. I am trying to make up for it now."
"When we were on Thassera, I shouldn't have been so standoffish. I should have asked you to dance. I am trying to make up for it now."
"When we were on Thassera, I shouldn't have been so standoffish. I should have asked you to dance. I am trying to make up for it now."
"When we were on Thassera, I shouldn't have been so standoffish. I should have asked you to dance. I am trying to make up for it now."

languages.text: 「タッセーラにいたとき、あんなによそよそしくするべきではありませんでした。あなたをダンスに誘うべきでした。今、その埋め合わせをさせてください」
languages.original_text: "When we were on Thassera, I shouldn't have been so standoffish. I should have asked you to dance. I am trying to make up for it now."

traits.locale_text: 「タッセーラにいたとき、あんなによそよそしくするべきではありませんでした。あなたをダンスに誘うべきでした。今、その埋め合わせをさせてください」

languages.text: "Ich hätte auf Thassera nicht so reserviert sein sollen. Ich hätte Euch zum Tanz auffordern sollen. Ich versuche gerade, das wiedergutzumachen."
languages.original_text: "When we were on Thassera, I shouldn't have been so standoffish. I should have asked you to dance. I am trying to make up for it now."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hätte auf Thassera nicht so reserviert sein sollen. Ich hätte Euch zum Tanz auffordern sollen. Ich versuche gerade, das wiedergutzumachen."

languages.text: « Quand nous étions sur Thassera, je n'aurais pas dû me montrer aussi distant. J'aurais dû vous inviter à danser. Et je m'efforce à présent de me rattraper. »
languages.original_text: "When we were on Thassera, I shouldn't have been so standoffish. I should have asked you to dance. I am trying to make up for it now."

traits.locale_text: « Quand nous étions sur Thassera, je n'aurais pas dû me montrer aussi distant. J'aurais dû vous inviter à danser. Et je m'efforce à présent de me rattraper. »

languages.text: «Cuando estábamos en Thassera, me mostré demasiado distante. Tendría que haberle sacado a bailar. Me gustaría enmendar ese error».
languages.original_text: "When we were on Thassera, I shouldn't have been so standoffish. I should have asked you to dance. I am trying to make up for it now."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando estábamos en Thassera, me mostré demasiado distante. Tendría que haberle sacado a bailar. Me gustaría enmendar ese error».

languages.text: “当初我们在塔瑟拉的时候，我不该那么冷淡，我本该邀请你一起跳支舞才是。现在，我正在努力弥补当时的错误。”
languages.original_text: "When we were on Thassera, I shouldn't have been so standoffish. I should have asked you to dance. I am trying to make up for it now."

traits.locale_text: “当初我们在塔瑟拉的时候，我不该那么冷淡，我本该邀请你一起跳支舞才是。现在，我正在努力弥补当时的错误。”

languages.text: "Thassera'dayken o kadar mesafeli davranmamalıydım. Seni dansa kaldırmalıydım. Şimdi telafi etmek istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "When we were on Thassera, I shouldn't have been so standoffish. I should have asked you to dance. I am trying to make up for it now."

traits.locale_text: "Thassera'dayken o kadar mesafeli davranmamalıydım. Sizi dansa kaldırmalıydım. Şimdi telafi etmek isterim."

languages.original_text: "When we were on Thassera, I shouldn't have been so standoffish. I should have asked you to dance. I am trying to make up for it now."
